trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this validation.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個驗證的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The certificate used to authenticate the remote party.
trans-unit.target: 憑證，用於驗證遠端群體。

trans-unit.source: The chain of certificate authorities associated with the remote certificate.
trans-unit.target: 憑證授權單位的鏈結，與遠端憑證相關聯。

trans-unit.source: One or more errors associated with the remote certificate.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個錯誤，與遠端憑證相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Verifies the remote Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 驗證用於驗證的遠端 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 憑證。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that determines whether the specified certificate is accepted for authentication.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，決定是否接受指定的憑證用於驗證。

trans-unit.source: The delegate's `sslPolicyErrors` argument contains any certificate errors returned by SSPI while authenticating the client or server.
trans-unit.target: 委派的`sslPolicyErrors`引數包含在驗證用戶端或伺服器時傳回的 SSPI 的任何憑證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Boolean> value returned by the method invoked by this delegate determines whether the authentication is allowed to succeed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>叫用此委派的方法所傳回的值會決定是否允許驗證成功。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class.
The following code example implements a method that is invoked by an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例實作的執行個體所叫用方法<xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>類別。

trans-unit.source: If there are validation errors, this method displays them and returns `false`, which prevents communication with the unauthenticated server.
trans-unit.target: 如果有驗證錯誤，這個方法會顯示它們，並傳回`false`，使未經驗證的伺服器與通訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates the delegate using the method defined in the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立使用上述的程式碼範例中定義的方法的委派。
